name: High School Rockstar Makeover
description:
No one could resist the temptation of beauty, glamor fashion & glamorous models! Every High School Girl dreams of delicate beautiful face like glamorous models. High School Rockstar Makeover Salon is for all those fashionista high fashion girl who covet fashion girl design sense and wish to try fun trendy makeover & unique fashion makeup styles on doll chic. Pick glamor fashion designer stylist girl dress up or outfits, gorgeous cosmetics to create endless fancy beauty makeup for the concert at High School since since you’re the best fashion stylist around, they’ve sent their rockstar to you for proper doll chic makeover! It’s a huge event that can make your princess makeup salon even more popular, so you must do a great job! As a famous high fashion stylist, show your high fashion makeup fantasy to surprise the high school fashion girl doll chic with the best beauty makeup ever so that they can look like glam doll. Make use of the hottest tips and the latest trends while doing your beauty makeup in this fun trendy makeover salon games. Become a high fashion stylist girl like glamorous models & do amazing hairstyles on doll chic, exquisite designer outfits or dress up, vibrant lipsticks,pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails in nail salon, beautiful eye shadows for your ultimate high fashion makeup games.

High school rockstar model girls are counting on you to make them look like glamorous model.Since you’re the best glamor fashion makeup stylist in the town. Running your own fun trendy makeover salon means you get to facial the high school rockstar and then perfect hot steam showering experience with pimple removal and skin cleansing. Head to the spa for a lovely facial. Cleanse, exfoliate and moisturize skin of high school rockstar with the finest products and treatments. Don’t forget a mud mask to remove impurities and cucumber tonic to minimize the appearance of under eye puffiness. Than give rockstar a stunning princess makeup with beautiful colors, apply princess makeup from your premium collection! Pick the best colors and add them with the touch, from lipstick, blush, earrings, eye-shades, to eyelashes! Use your fashionista dress up skills select some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails in nail salon to show off your high fashion girl skills in this makeup games.

Features:
* Start fun trendy fashion girl glam doll chic makeover by choosing the best fashionista hair color & hairstyles at girl makeover salon
* Try wonderful colored contact lens
* Apply fashionista glitter blush-on for chic makeover in makeup salon
* Enhance girl’s eyes by applying eyeliner, eyelashes, eye shadow, lipstick, eyebrow, Finish with mascara in girl makeover salon
* Beautify fashion girl glam doll face by applying perfect-matching glitter blush on and sparkling lipstick in makeup salon
* Plentiful shoes of different styles to choose for fashion girl glam doll
* Lastly enhance beautiful eyes by apply eyeliner and mascara in makeup games.
* Choose a charming gorgeous outfit & dress upfrom the countless pretty outfits
* Countless princess makeup salon items to create charming & glamorous looks for girls makeover at makeup salon
* A huge variety of fashionista decoration items, including earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and headgears to choose in makeup games.
* No beauty makeup is complete without a fashionista manicure in nail salon!
